bio: Content creator writing about Web3 and Crypto.
contributionDescription:
I have created various educational and informational content about Optimism, its ecosystem, dapps, fundamentals, Superchain, events, catalysts, etc.

Wrote thread, substack article, and various single tweets.

I have kept my community updated with the latest OP events, improvements and educated them about the Optimism ecosystem.

Also recommended OP ambassador @Subli_Defi to my community.
(If they want to know more resources/info about OP ecosystem)

contributionLinks.description: OP superchain thread. Highlighting importance and impact of Superchain on crypto
Substack article about top projects on Optimism with price estimation in bull.
Updating my community about improving OP fundamentals.

impactDescription:
My community is well-informed about the latest OP catalysts and events.

Also, shared several projects built on top of Optimism.
I believe they have a better understanding of where they can swap, trade, buy nfts and many other things on OP.

This brought volume and activity to OP dapps.
